description: (Maximal base 2 digit of n)-(minimal base 2 digit of n).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: 0 followed by a string of 2^k - 1 1's. Also a(n)=0 iff n = 2^m - 1.G.f.: 1/(1-x) - Sum_{k>=0} x^(2^k-1). - _Michael Somos_, Aug 25 2003a(n)=(1+(-1)^C(n,floor(n/2)))/2; - _Paul Barry_, Jun 07 2006Ignoring first zero and beginning instead with offset 2, a(n) = A006530(n) mod 2. - _Rick L. Shepherd_, Jun 09 2008
author: _Clark Kimberling_
